name: SuperHot (itch)
description:
Create your own First-Person shooter with Unity.

Perspective Valley is the most complete tool to create your own single-

player perspective games with Unity in the spirit of the classics of the genre.

Demo available on - https://brackeys-studio.itch.io/superhot

🗣  Discord server link - https://discord.gg/rmPnnY2VKP

📚  Facebook page link -  https://www.facebook.com/Brackeys-Studio-104061268482102

Unity asset store URL - http://u3d.as/2uq3 or

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/slug/193746

🛠  FEATURES  🛠

• Easy-to-use visual editor to create players and environment.

• Scriptable object-based architecture.

• Complete set of unique graphics, animations and effects designed by Brackeys Studio. 

• This includes 1 unique player character with skeletal animation, 1 unique enemy character with supercool death particle effect like superhot game 

  and beautiful props & environments.

• Beautiful PostProcessing volume.

• Complete and extensively documented PDF.

❗  COMPATIBILITY  ❗

• Unity version: SuperHot is compatible with Unity Personal, Plus and Pro. Unity 2019.2.3f1 or higher is required.

• Deployment platforms: SuperHot is fully compatible with all Unity platforms, including standalone, consoles and mobile.

• Development platforms: SuperHot has been fully tested with Windows and Mac OS X.

This game template has DOTween asset.

What are you waiting for? 

Get started with SuperHot Template & make world of imagination!
